Dave Burkett | 0419 989 655

Hi David, 

Yes, we can absolutely do this for you. Testimonials are an amazing marketing tool. 

If you need a hand collecting reviews we actually have a dedicated platform for this! It's called Smart Reviews. 

Smart Reviews uses a mix of email and SMS to request reviews. The above testimonial format is good, however, it requires a user to land on your site first. With Smart Reviews, your 4 and 5 star testimonials are published to Google. This means that you increase the likelihood of 'plucking' new customers straight from the search results pages. We then embed these reviews on your site to amplify their marketing power. The system can contact past customers as well with a bulk import feature and if there are any 3 star or below testimonials we still collect these and get the intel over to you, but, it's not made public. And it's all automated. If you are interested, let me know and we can have a call where I can show you behind the scenes and specifically how it can work for you.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
